comments.comment: Swargaya thiya numbalata nirayawath aithi nehe. Numbalage dharmaya numbalata monawadha mey kiyadhila thiyenne??? Kumakda oya pahath kriyawa?  Pehedhili dharmayak adhahewwe nethi kama. Dhenumai buddhiyai yanu dhekak bawa mey ugath yei kiyu niwata pahath neecha sunaka muslim anthawadhin loketama kiuwa. Nubalata awabodhaya thibila nehe. Awabodhaya nethi Dhenumen  ugathkamin palak nehe. Sathara apaagatha wannatawath numbala sudhusu nehe. Kotiganan hith walin karana shaapayan, wilaapayan muslim anthawadhi janasamaajayatama nowedhi thiyei kiya numba sithanawada? Shaapalath jathiyak wee pruthuwi thalayenma winaaasha wee yai numbala. NAWATHWANNA PAHATH MILECHCHA KRIYAWAN! Allah yana dewiyek numbalata anuwa sitinawanam ethumath nubala gena lejja wenawa noanumaanai. Karmaya thamai siyallama! Parisan dhewi numbalata mihipiten wadhawee yana thuruma! Shaapalath jaathiyak bawata mathu anagathayedhi sandhahan wei numbala gena puskolayaka mey kala aparaadhayanta!
comments.author: DILRANGI LIYARNGE

comments.comment:
ISLAM IS A DRUG !!! SAY NO TO ISLAM!!!! 

THE VERSES FROM QURAN :

2:191-‚ÄúKill them (unbelievers) wherever you find them. Drive them out of the places from which they drove you, for persecution is worse than slaughter‚Ä¶. Such is the reward of those who reject faith.‚Äù

2:193-‚ÄúFight against them (unbelievers) until there is no dissension, and the religion is for Allah.‚Äù
Fight until no other religion exists but Islam.

2:218-‚ÄúBut those who believe and those who migrate and struggle in the way of Allah, those, have hope of the mercy of Allah.‚Äù
Those who fight for Allah may have hope of forgiveness.

3:10-‚ÄúThose who disbelieve, neither their riches nor their children shall save them from Allah. They shall become the fuel of the fire.‚Äù

3:19-‚ÄúThe only true faith in God‚Äôs sight is Islam. Those to whom the book was given disagreed among themselves only after knowledge had been given to them, being insolent among themselves. He who disbelieves the verses of Allah indeed Allah is swift in reckoning.‚Äù

3:28-‚ÄúThe believers should not take the unbelievers as friends or helpers in preference to the believers. He who does this does not belong to Allah in anything, unless you have a fear of them.‚Äù
